 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרָא‎</span>] **verb** only **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular: meaning dubious, perhaps ***beat*** the air, or ***flap*** the wings, compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#De|De]] (and [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]] in [[BDB#De|De]]), [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***whip, urge on*** a horse ?); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְרִ֑יא תִּשְׂחָק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַסּוּם וּלְדֹבְבוֺ׃‎</span> [[Job.39.18|Job 39:18]] ***she*** (the ostrich) ***flaps away***, she laughs at the horse and his rider.
